memetic

memetic Directory Reference


Files

file  agent.c [code]
 Implements a local search technique to find a perturbation which modifies the chosen L-System to generate more difficult instances.
file  evoalg.c [code]
 Uses the evolutionary algorithm technique to find a fractal (represented by an L-System) such that the actual (x,y) data points are used as an instance of a Travelling Salesman Problem solved by the program Concorde and are relatively difficult to solve.
